description:
My place is close to great restaurants, nightlife, boutiques & steps to the F-train Metro station. The apartment is a spacious 2 bedroom that sleeps up to 5 people. We provide all the essentials to make your stay super comfortable: clean bed linens, towels, Fast WiFi, Cable TV, cooking utensils, & plenty of closet space for our guests.

Located in the trendy Lower East Side. The apartment is walking distance to Chinatown, Little Italy, Nolita and the East Village.
name: Spacious 2 Bedroom in Trendy/Prime Location!
review: The interior and location of the apartment are great. We enjoyed staying in the spacy apartment, and would definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a place on Manhattan at a reasonable price.
